hints.content:
If you lined up $\green{\text{Alex's marbles}}$ and $\blue{\text{Emily's marbles}}$, $5$ would match up, and then $\green{\text{Alex}}$ would have $\green{4}$ extra marbles.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/6662d420e91f3ebc9e0a89c6b77ec91875587208)
Alex has $\red{4}$ more marbles than Emily.

question.content:
Alex has $9$ marbles.

Emily has $5$ marbles.

**How many more marbles does Alex have than Emily?**

[[☃ input-number 1]] marbles
